mapper.insert: INSERT into post(po_title, po_co_num, po_content, po_me_num, po_viewCount, po_recommendCount, po_notRecommendCount, po_delete) VALUES (#{po_title}, #{po_co_num}, #{po_content}, #{po_me_num}, #{po_viewCount}, #{po_recommendCount}, #{po_notRecommendCount}, #{po_delete})
mapper.select: SELECT po_num, po_title, po_content, po_date, po_hidden, po_viewCount, po_recommendCount, po_notRecommendCount, po_reportCount, po_notice, po_me_num, po_co_num, po_delete, me_id FROM post JOIN member ON po_me_num = me_num WHERE po_num = #{po_num}

SELECT post.*, me_id, count(if(re_state = 1, re_state, null)) AS po_recommendCount, count(if(re_state = -1, re_state, null)) AS po_notRecommendCount FROM post LEFT JOIN recommend ON po_num = re_po_num JOIN member ON po_me_num = me_num WHERE po_co_num = #{co_num}
GROUP BY po_num ORDER BY po_num DESC
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM post WHERE co_num = #{co_num} AND po_delete = 0
mapper.update: UPDATE post SET po_viewCount = po_viewCount + 1 WHERE po_num = #{po_num}

UPDATE post SET po_recommendCount = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM recommend WHERE re_po_num = #{po_num} AND re_state = 1), po_notRecommendCount = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM recommend WHERE re_po_num = #{po_num} AND re_state = -1) WHERE po_num = #{po_num};
mapper.insert: INSERT into recommend(re_po_num, re_state, re_me_num) VALUES (#{re_po_num}, #{re_state}, #{re_me_num})
mapper.delete: delete from bookmark where bm_me_num = #{bm_me_num} and bm_po_num = #{po_num}
mapper.select: select distinct bm_po_num from bookmark where bm_po_num = #{po_num} and bm_me_num = #{bm_me_num} limit 1
